sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of length 7 cm and a height of 5 cm. Find the area of the parallelogram in square centimeters.
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be found using the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 7 cm and the height is 5 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 7 cm × 5 cm = 35 square centimeters
